sentence.Network_en: Now with Joy for company, she didn't pester him so much and he came home later.
sentence.Network_cn: 近来,有小福子做伴儿, 她不甚管束他了,他就晚回来一些.

sentence.Network_en: He told her not to pester him with trifles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对她说不要为小事而烦扰他.

sentence.Network_en: PLAYER, how long will you pester me with indecisive ways?
sentence.Network_cn: 你到底要为这些细枝末节纠缠我多久?

list.abs: they pestered us for money .他们缠住我们要钱.
when children are very young it is easy to circumvent pester power .当孩子还小的时候是很容易防止儿童消费力。
when children are very young it is easy to circumvent pester power .当孩子还小的时候是很容易防止儿童消费力。
You are a confounded nuisance ; stop pestering me ., 你这个可恶的东西 , 别再缠着我了.
he told the photographers to stop pestering him ., 他告诉照相的人别再缠著他.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the senses 'overcrowd (a place') and 'impede (a person'): from French empestrer 'encumber', influenced by pest. The current sense is an extension of an earlier use, 'infest', referring to vermin

entry.def: If you say that someone is pestering you, you mean that they keep asking you to do something, or keep talking to you, and you find this annoying.

example.ex: I thought she'd stop pestering me, but it only seemed to make her worse...
example.tran: 我原以为她会停止纠缠我，但结果她似乎是变本加厉了。

example.ex: I know he gets fed up with people pestering him for money.
example.tran: 我知道他烦透了那些缠着他要钱的人。

sentences.sentence: "The children teased the boy because of his stammer"

auth_sentence.content: But don't pester everyone about becoming a full-time employee.
auth_sentence.res_content: But don't pester everyone about becoming a full-time employee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But don't pester everyone about becoming a full-time employee.

auth_sentence.content: "Every day they pester taxi drivers," Diallho said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Every day they pester taxi drivers," Diallho said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Every day they pester taxi drivers," Diallho said.

auth_sentence.content: Tamara Pester, a Denver lawyer, has created a game called Passover Bingo to play at the dinner table.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tamara Pester, a Denver lawyer, has created a game called Passover Bingo to play at the dinner table.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tamara Pester, a Denver lawyer, has created a game called Passover Bingo to play at the dinner table.

Sentence.sentence: Back in the good old days—say, two years ago, when the last of my children suffered the ordeal (折磨)—a high-school student applying to college could procrastinate all the way to New Year's Day of their senior year, assuming they could withstand the parental pestering (烦扰).

sentences.en: The little girl pestered the travellers for money.
sentences.cn: 那个小女孩缠着游客要钱。

jushi.english: The little girl pestered the travellers for money.
jushi.chinese: 那个小女孩缠着游客要钱。
